pathAssistantSteps.info:
The 'Contract' stage signifies that the client has accepted the proposal and is ready to formalise agreement with a Contract with QUT.

Selecting 'Create a Contract' will automatically generate a record within the Contracts Lifecycle Management System (CLMS). Manage the contract process within the CLMS.

The ‘Proposal’ stage allows you to generate a standard QUTeX proposal to download, edit and collaborate on.

Following your initial drafting, you can distribute your Proposal for internal review, feedback, and approval to proceed, and/or to the client for review and acceptance.

The ‘Qualify’ stage enables you to define the opportunity that may exist and who’s involved, to confirm viability and the client’s readiness, and to capture approvals to proceed.

Use the ‘Qualification Summary’ field to justify that the opportunity is viable and why it should progress.

Where the opportunity includes an award unit and/or non-award module, work with the Academic Lead to gain Faculty approval to proceed using CourseLoop.
